Instructions to Use the Graph Users can drag on the canvas along the y-Axis to zoom into specific ranges. Users can double click on the canvas to reset the y-Axis. Users can hover mouse on each dot to see exact disbursement value, date, and candidate information. Users can click on the list of candidate names to display or hide each trend line.
